patthana18.1:5.1: Hetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.1:5.2: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.1:6.1: Hetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.1:7.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana18.1:8.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā …
patthana18.1:9.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte cattāri … pe … navippayutte ekaṃ … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana18.1:12.1: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana18.1:13.1: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:13.2: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:13.3: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa ca nanahetussa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana18.1:14.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:14.2: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:14.3: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa ca nanahetussa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:15.1: Hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:15.2: Hetu sahetuko ca nahetusahetuko ca dhammā nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:16.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve, anantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe cattāri, nissaye pañca, upanissaye cha, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme … pe … āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge pañca, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana18.1:17.1: Hetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana18.1:18.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.1:19.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cattāri.
